meanings.sent1: The humongous elephant towered over the trees.
meanings.sent2: The humongous cake was enough to feed the entire party.
meanings.sent3: The humongous teddy bear looked comically large in the tiny chair.
meanings.sent4: The humongous mountain cast a shadow over the entire valley.
meanings.sent5: The humongous waves crashed against the shore with immense power.

meanings.definition: Very big in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The humongous building could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent2: The humongous crowd cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The humongous sandwich was too big to fit in his mouth.
meanings.sent4: The humongous task of cleaning the garage seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The humongous tree provided shade for the entire park.
